languages.text: "Отнюдь, Лорд-капитан. Таков способ сосредоточения, которым пользуется хор на вашем корабле. Я сам его изобрел. Эта музыка написана астропатом — я и мои подопечные слышим ее не как обычные люди. Без благословения Императора невозможно постичь ее истинную глубину и красоту. Она оберегает наш разум от рудиментарных мыслей, очищает его и фокусирует. Но главное — она служит нам своеобразным маяком в бушующем Океане душ, ниточкой, по которой можно вернуться домой из смертельного лабиринта".

traits.locale_text: "Отнюдь, Лорд-капитан. Таков наш способ сосредоточиться. Эта музыка написана астропатом — я и мои подопечные слышим ее не как обычные люди. Без благословения Императора невозможно постичь ее истинную глубину и красоту. Она оберегает наш разум от рудиментарных мыслей, очищает его и фокусирует. Но самое главное — она служит нам своеобразным маяком в бушующем Океане душ, ниточкой, по которой можно вернуться домой из смертельного лабиринта".

languages.text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is a mental focusing technique used by your flagship's Choir, one that I invented myself. This music was written by an Astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."
languages.original_text: "Отнюдь, Лорд-капитан. Таков способ сосредоточения, которым пользуется хор на вашем корабле. Я сам его изобрел. Эта музыка написана астропатом — я и мои подопечные слышим ее не как обычные люди. Без благословения Императора невозможно постичь ее истинную глубину и красоту. traits.locale_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is how we focus. That music was written by an astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."

What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."

languages.text: «Al contrario, Lord Capitán. Se trata de una técnica de concentración que emplea el Coro de su nave insignia, la inventé yo. El compositor de esta música era un Astrópata; lo que los míos y yo escuchamos es distinto a lo que oye la gente corriente. Su verdadera profundidad y belleza son incomprensibles para quienes no gozan de la bendición del Emperador. La música protege nuestras mentes de los pensamientos rudimentarios, las purifica y las agudiza. Pero, por encima de todo, actúa como una suerte de faro en el tumultuoso Mar de Almas; un hilo que nos conduce a casa desde ese laberinto mortífero».
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is a mental focusing technique used by your flagship's Choir, one that I invented myself. This music was written by an Astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."

traits.locale_text: «Al contrario, Lord Capitán. Así es como nos concentramos. El compositor de esta música era un Astrópata; lo que los míos y yo escuchamos es distinto a lo que oye la gente corriente. Su verdadera profundidad y belleza son incomprensibles para quienes no gozan de la bendición del Emperador. La música protege nuestras mentes de los pensamientos rudimentarios, las purifica y las agudiza. Pero, por encima de todo, actúa como una suerte de faro en el tumultuoso Mar de Almas; un hilo que nos conduce a casa desde ese laberinto mortífero».

languages.text: 「その逆です、ロード・キャプテン。 旗艦の聖歌隊が使っている精神集中のテクニックで、私自身が考案したものです。この音楽は感応通信官によって作曲されたものです。私と部下が聴いているのは、普通の人間が聴くものとは異なります。その真の深みと美しさは、皇帝の祝福なしには理解できません。この音楽は私たちの心を未熟な思考から守り、浄化し、研ぎ澄します。そして何より、激動の魂の海の中で、一種の道しるべとなり、死の迷路から我々を家へと導く糸となるのです」
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is a mental focusing technique used by your flagship's Choir, one that I invented myself. This music was written by an Astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."

traits.locale_text: 「その逆だ、ロード・キャプテン。そのおかげで私たちは集中できる。この音楽も感応通信官が作曲したもの。私と部下が聴いているのは、普通の人間が聴くものではない。その真の深みと美しさは、皇帝の祝福なしには理解できないのだ。この音楽は私たちの心を未熟な思考から守り、浄化し、研ぎ澄ます。そして何より、激動の魂の海の中で、一種の道しるべの役割を果たすんだ。死の迷路から家へと導いてくれる糸さ」

languages.text: “恰恰相反，舰长大人。这是我亲自发明的技术，专门用来协助旗舰上的星语唱诗班集中精神。那首曲子是某位星语者创作的，我和我的学徒能听到一般人听不到的东西。这篇乐章的旋律美妙而深邃，恐怕只有受帝皇祝福的人才能领略。它可以保护我们的思想，过滤杂质，让我们的心智变得更加敏锐。更重要的是，它会在喧嚣的灵魂之海中充当灯塔的角色，它的线索可以指引我们走出危机四伏的迷宫，返回故乡。”
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is a mental focusing technique used by your flagship's Choir, one that I invented myself. This music was written by an Astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."

traits.locale_text: “恰恰相反，舰长大人，只有听到那样的声音，我们才能集中精神。那首曲子是一位星语者创作的，我和我的学徒能听到一般人听不到的东西。这首曲子美妙、深邃的旋律，恐怕只有受帝皇祝福的人才能领略。这首乐章可以保护我们的思想，过滤杂质，让我们的心智变得更加敏锐。更重要的是，它会在喧嚣的灵魂之海中充当灯塔的角色，它的线索可以指引我们走出危机四伏的迷宫，返回故乡。”

languages.text: "Im Gegenteil, Lord Captain. Es ist eine mentale Konzentrationstechnik des Chors unseres Flaggschiffs, die ich selbst erdacht habe. Diese Musik wurde von einem Astropathen geschrieben. Meine Untergebenen und ich hören darin etwas anderes als gewöhnliche Leute. Die wahre Tiefe und Schönheit kann man nur mit dem Segen des Imperators begreifen. Die Musik schützt unseren Verstand vor rudimentären Gedanken, läutert, reinigt und schärft ihn. Vor allem aber dient sie als eine Art Leuchtfeuer im rauen Meer der Seelen, als Faden, der uns aus dem tödlichen Labyrinth wieder nach Hause führt."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is a mental focusing technique used by your flagship's Choir, one that I invented myself. This music was written by an Astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegenteil, Lord Captain. So konzentrieren wir uns. Diese Musik wurde von einem Astropathen geschrieben. Meine Untergebenen und ich hören darin etwas anderes als gewöhnliche Leute. Die wahre Tiefe und Schönheit kann man nur mit dem Segen des Imperators begreifen. Die Musik schützt unseren Verstand vor rudimentären Gedanken, läutert, reinigt und schärft ihn. Vor allem aber dient sie als eine Art Leuchtfeuer im rauen Meer der Seelen, als Faden, der uns aus dem tödlichen Labyrinth wieder nach Hause führt."

languages.text: « Bien au contraire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il s'agit d'une technique de concentration mentale de mon invention, utilisée par le chœur de votre vaisseau. Cette musique a été composée par un astropathe. À travers elle, mes protégés et moi-même percevons des choses qui dépassent l'entendement du commun des mortels. Sa profondeur et sa beauté véritables ne sont accessibles qu'avec la bénédiction de l'Empereur. Non contente de prémunir nos esprits des pensées primitives, cette mélodie les purifie et les affûte. Plus important encore, c'est un phare qui nous guide à travers les flots tumultueux de la Mer des Âmes, une ligne de vie qui nous permet de naviguer jusqu'à bon port dans ce funeste labyrinthe. »
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is a mental focusing technique used by your flagship's Choir, one that I invented myself. This music was written by an Astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."

traits.locale_text: « Bien au contraire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est ainsi que nous nous concentrons. Cette musique a été composée par un astropathe. À travers elle, mes protégés et moi-même percevons des choses qui dépassent l'entendement du commun des mortels. Sa profondeur et sa beauté véritables ne sont accessibles qu'avec la bénédiction de l'Empereur. Non contente de prémunir nos esprits des pensées primitives, cette mélodie les purifie et les affûte. Plus important encore, c'est un phare qui nous guide à travers les flots tumultueux de la Mer des Âmes, une ligne de vie qui nous permet de naviguer jusqu'à bon port dans ce funeste labyrinthe. »

languages.text: "Bilakis Lord Kaptan. Duyduğunuz ses, sancak geminizin Korosu tarafından kullanılan ve bizzat icadım olan zihinsel bir odaklanma tekniğidir. Müziği bir Astropat besteledi. Çıraklarımla birlikte duyduklarımız, sıradan insanların duyduklarından farklıdır. Hakiki derinliği ve güzelliği, İmparator'un lütfu olmadan idrak edilemez. Müzik, zihinlerimizi ilkel düşüncelerden korur, arındırır ve geliştirir. Ancak hepsinin ötesinde çalkantılı Ruhlar Denizi'nin ortasında yol gösteren bir fener, ölümcül labirentten bizi yuvamıza taşıyan bir işaret görevi görür."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. It is a mental focusing technique used by your flagship's Choir, one that I invented myself. This music was written by an Astropath. What my charges and I hear in it is not what ordinary people hear. Its true depth and beauty cannot be fathomed without the Emperor's blessing. The music protects our minds from rudimentary thoughts, purifies, and sharpens them. But above all else, it serves as a beacon of sorts amid the tumultuous Sea of Souls, a thread to lead us home from the deadly maze."
